## buildLinkColumn variable

Builds a link column, which is a string column where the text is a hyperlink. Note that pattern and params are optional config properties, that if omitted simply results in a plain string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
buildLinkColumn: (config: LinkColumnConfig, data?: any[]) => any
```
